title: Judd Apatow | House Votes to Hold Two More of Trump's Coup Accomplices in Criminal Contempt: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the House voting to hold two more of Trump’s associates in contempt amid its investigation into his coup attempt.

Then, Judd Apatow talks about interviewing comedians for his book Sicker in the Head, celebrating 25 years of marriage to Leslie Mann and the best way to watch The Bubble.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
